ShiftSpace

A singleton controller object that represents ShiftSpace Core.  All methods functions and variables are private.  Please refer to the documention on User, ShiftSpace.Space, ShiftSpace.Shift, ShiftSpace.Plugin to see public interfaces.

Summary
ShiftSpaceA singleton controller object that represents ShiftSpace Core.
Functions
initializeSets up external components and loads installed spaces.
SSAddEventAdds a Mootools style custom event to the ShiftSpace object.
SSFireEventA function to fire events.
SSSetPrefForSpaceSet user preference for a space.
SSGetPrefForSpaceRetrieve a preference for a space.
infoProvides basic information about ShiftSpace’s current state.
SSGetShiftContentReturns the actual content of shift.
SSGetUrlForShiftReturns the url of a shift.
SSGetRecentlyViewedShiftsReturns a hash of recently viewed shifts.
SSSpaceForShiftReturns the space singleton for a shift.
SSUserForShiftReturns the username for a shift.
SSUserOwnsShiftUsed to check whether the currently logged in user authored a shift.
SSUserCanEditShiftUsed to check whether a user has permission to edit a shift.
SSIsNewShiftUsed to check whether a shift is newly created and unsaved.
SSSetShiftStatusSets the shift public private status.
SSGetPluginReturns a plugin object.
SSGetPluginTypeReturns the plugin type.
SSPlugInMenuIconForShiftReturns the icon for a particular shift if the plugin is menu based.
SSImplementsProtocolA method to check if an object implements the required properties.
SSIsSSElementCheck wheter a node is a ShiftSpace Element or has a parent node that is.
SSIsNotSSElementConveniece function that returns the opposite of SSIsSSElement.
SSFocusedShiftIdReturns the current focused shift’s id.
SSSetFocusedShiftIdShould never be called.
SSFocusedSpaceReturns the currently focused space object.
SSSetFocusedSpaceShould never be called
SSSetHiddenSets the private hidden variable.
ShiftSpaceIsHiddenReturns whether ShiftSpace is hidden, that is in full screen mode.
ShiftSpaceHideHide ShiftSpace for fullscreen mode.
ShiftSpaceShowShow ShiftSpace, normally used when exiting fullscreen mode.
SSInstallSpaceLoads the JavaScript source of a Space, then loads the space into memory.
SSUninstallSpaceRemoves a space from memory and from stored caches.
SSXmlHttpRequestPrivate version of GM_xmlHttpRequest.
SSClearCacheExpunge previously stored files.
initShift (private)Creates a new shift on the page.
SSShowNewShiftShows a new shift, different from showShift in that it immediately puts the shift in edit mode.
focusShift (private)Focuses a shift.
blurShiftBlurs a shift.
updateTitleOfShiftTell the space to the update the title of the shift if necessary.
showShiftDisplays a shift on the page.
SSAddRecentlyViewedShiftAdd a recently viewed shift.
hideShiftHides a shift from the page.
SSCheckForContent (private)Sends a request to the server about the current page’s ShiftSpace content.
SSCheckForAutolaunchCheck for Spaces which need to be auto-launched.
SSAllShiftIdsForSpaceReturns all shift ids on the current url for a particular Space.
SSConsoleIsReady (private)Called by the Console object when it finishes initializing.
loadShifts (private)Loads the actual shift data for the current page.
SSGetShiftReturns a shift by shift id.
SSGetAuthorForShiftReturns the username of the Shift owner as a string.
SSGetShiftDataReturns a copy of the shift data.
SSSetShiftUpdate the shift properties of a shift.
SSLoadShiftLoad a single shift from the network.
SSLoadShiftsSame as SSLoadShift except handles an array of shift id.
SSShiftIsLoadedCheck to see if the shift has it’s content loaded yet.
SSHasPropertyConvenience function to check whether an object has a property.
SSGetShiftsSimilar to SSLoadShifts, probably should be merged.
SSGetPageShiftIdsForUserGets all the shifts ids on the current page for the logged in user.
saveShift (private)Saves a shift’s JSON object to the server.
saveNewShift (private)Creates a new entry for the shift on the server.
editShift (private)Edit a shift.
deleteShift (private)Deletes a shift from the server.
SSCheckForPageIframesCheck for already existing iframes on the page and add covers to them.
SSCreateCoverCreate a cover.
SSAddCoverAdd a iframe cover object to an internal array.
SSAddIframeCoversAdd the iframe covers to the page.
SSUpdateIframeCoversUpdate the position of the iframe covers.
SSRemoveIframeCoversRemove the covers for the iframe.
SSCreatePinSelectCreate the visible pin selection interface bits.
SSPinMouseOverHandlerA mouse over handler for pin events.
SSPinMouseMoveHandlerThe pin handler that checks for mouse movement.
SSPinMouseClickHandlerA pin handler.
SSCheckPinReferencesCheck to see if there is a conflicting pin reference on the page already.
SSPinElementPin an element to the page.
SSUnpinElementUnpin an element from the page.
SSAttachPinEventsAttaches the mouse events to the window to handle Pin selection.
SSRemovePinEventsRemove all pin selection listening events from the window.
SSStartPinSelectionStart pin selection mode.
SSStopPinSelectionStop handling pin selection.
loadFile (private)Loads a URL and executes a callback with the response
loadSpace (private)Loads the space’s source code, executes it and stores an instance of the space class in the ‘spaces’ object
SSRegisterSpace (private)Called by the Space class to register with ShiftSpace.
SSRemoveShiftRemove a shift from the internal array.
SSLoadPlugin (private)Loads a plugin
SSRegisterPlugin (private)Register a plugin.
serverCall (private)Sends a request to the server.
setValue (private)A wrapper function for GM_setValue that handles non-string data better.
getValue (private, except in debug mode)A wrapper function for GM_getValue that handles non-string data better.
loadStyle (private)Loads a CSS file, processes it to make URLs absolute, then appends it as a STYLE element in the page HEAD.
log (private)Logs a message to the console, but only in debug mode or when reporting errors.
SSCanGoFullScreenReturns wether ShiftSpace can lose the fullscreen mode.
SSCanExitFullScreenReturn whther ShiftSpace is ready to return to full screen mode.
SSCreateErrorWindowCreate the error window.
SSShowErrorWindowShow the error window.
SSHideErrorWindowHide the error window.
SSErrorWindowUpdateTableForShiftUpdate object description table for a shift.

Functions

initialize

this.initialize = function()

Sets up external components and loads installed spaces.

SSAddEvent

function SSAddEvent(eventType,
callback)

Adds a Mootools style custom event to the ShiftSpace object.

Parameters

eventTypea event type as string.
callbacka function.

See also

SSFireEvent

SSFireEvent

function SSFireEvent(eventType,
data)

A function to fire events.

Parameters

eventTypeevent type as string.
dataany extra event data that should be passed to the event listener.

SSSetPrefForSpace

function SSSetPrefForSpace(spaceName,
pref,
value)

Set user preference for a space.  Calls setValue.  The preference key will be converted to username.spaceName.preferenceKey.

Parameters

spaceNamespace name as string.
prefstring representing the preference name.
valuethe value to be set.

SSGetPrefForSpace

function SSGetPrefForSpace(spaceName,
pref)

Retrieve a preference for a space.

Parameters

spaceNamespaceName as string.
prefthe preference key.

info

this.info = function(spaceName)

Provides basic information about ShiftSpace’s current state.

Parameters

spaceName(optional) Get information about a specific installed space.

Returns

When no parameter is specified, returns an object with the following variables set:

  • server (string), the base URL of the ShiftSpace server
  • spaces (string), a list of currently installed spaces
  • version (string), the current version of ShiftSpace

If spaceName is specified, returns the following information about the space:

  • title (string), a human-readable version of the space name
  • icon (string), the URL of the Space’s icon
  • version (string), the current version of the installed Space

SSGetShiftContent

function SSGetShiftContent(shiftId)

Returns the actual content of shift.  The content is the actual representation of the shift as defined by the encode method of the originating Shift class.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

A Javascript object with the shifts’s properties.

SSGetUrlForShift

function SSGetUrlForShift(shiftId)

Returns the url of a shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

A url as a string.

SSGetRecentlyViewedShifts

function SSGetRecentlyViewedShifts(callback)

Returns a hash of recently viewed shifts.  The shifts are hashed by their id.  Each id points to a Javascript object that has the metadata for that particular shift.

Parameters

callbacka function to be called when the operation is complete.  A callback is necessary since plugins have access.

SSSpaceForShift

function SSSpaceForShift(shiftId)

Returns the space singleton for a shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

The space singleton.

SSUserForShift

function SSUserForShift(shiftId)

Returns the username for a shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

The shift author’s username as a string.

SSUserOwnsShift

function SSUserOwnsShift(shiftId)

Used to check whether the currently logged in user authored a shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

true or false.

SSUserCanEditShift

function SSUserCanEditShift(shiftId)

Used to check whether a user has permission to edit a shift.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

true or false.

SSIsNewShift

function SSIsNewShift(shiftId)

Used to check whether a shift is newly created and unsaved.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

SSSetShiftStatus

function SSSetShiftStatus(shiftId,
newStatus)

Sets the shift public private status.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.
newStatusthe status.

SSGetPlugin

function SSGetPlugin(pluginName)

Returns a plugin object.

Parameters

pluginNamea name representing a plugin.

Returns

A plugin object.

SSGetPluginType

function SSGetPluginType(pluginName)

Returns the plugin type.

Parameters

pluginNamethe plugin name as a string.

See Also

Plugin.js

SSPlugInMenuIconForShift

function SSPlugInMenuIconForShift(pluginName,
shiftId,
callback)

Returns the icon for a particular shift if the plugin is menu based.

Parameters

pluginNameplugin name as string.
shiftIda shift id.
callbacka function callback because the plugin may not be loaded yet.

Returns

A CSS style with a background image style that will point to the icon image.

SSImplementsProtocol

function SSImplementsProtocol(protocol,
object)

A method to check if an object implements the required properties.

Parameters

protocolan array of required properties
objectthe javascript object in need of verification.

Returns

A javascript object that contains two properties, ‘result’ which is a boolean and ‘missing’, an array of missing properties.

SSIsSSElement

function SSIsSSElement(node)

Check wheter a node is a ShiftSpace Element or has a parent node that is.

Parameters

nodea DOM node.

Returns

true or false.

SSIsNotSSElement

function SSIsNotSSElement(node)

Conveniece function that returns the opposite of SSIsSSElement.  Useful for node filtering.

Parameters

nodea DOM node.

Returns

true or false.

Returns the current focused shift’s id.

Returns

a shift id.

function SSSetFocusedShiftId(newId)

Should never be called.

Parameters

newIda shift id.

Should never be called

Parameters

Sets the private hidden variable.

Parameters

valsets a boolean value.

ShiftSpaceIsHidden

function ShiftSpaceIsHidden()

Returns whether ShiftSpace is hidden, that is in full screen mode.

Parameters

return a boolean.

ShiftSpaceHide

function ShiftSpaceHide()

Hide ShiftSpace for fullscreen mode.

ShiftSpaceShow

function ShiftSpaceShow()

Show ShiftSpace, normally used when exiting fullscreen mode.

SSInstallSpace

function SSInstallSpace(space,
pendingShift)

Loads the JavaScript source of a Space, then loads the space into memory.  The source URL is saved in the ‘installed’ object for future reference.

Parameters

spaceThe Space name to install
pendingShiftA shift to show upon installation

SSUninstallSpace

function SSUninstallSpace(spaceName)

Removes a space from memory and from stored caches.

Parameters

spacethe Space name to remove

SSXmlHttpRequest

function SSXmlHttpRequest(config)

Private version of GM_xmlHttpRequest.  Implemented for public use via Space/Shift.xmlhttpRequest.

Parameters

configsame JSON object as used by GM_xmlhttpRequest.

SSClearCache

function SSClearCache(url)

Expunge previously stored files.

Parameters

url(Optional) The URL of the file to remove.  If not specified, all files in the cache will be deleted.

function initShift(spaceName,
options)

Creates a new shift on the page.

Parameters

spaceThe name of the Space the Shift belongs to.

SSShowNewShift

function SSShowNewShift(shiftId)

Shows a new shift, different from showShift in that it immediately puts the shift in edit mode.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

SSLoadShift

function SSLoadShift(shiftId,
callback)

Load a single shift from the network.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.
callbacka callback handler.

SSLoadShifts

function SSLoadShifts(shiftIds,
callback)

Same as SSLoadShift except handles an array of shift id.

Parameters

shiftIdsan array of shift ids.
callbacka callback handler.

SSShiftIsLoaded

function SSShiftIsLoaded(shiftId)

Check to see if the shift has it’s content loaded yet.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

Returns

a boolean value.

prop)

objan Object.
propthe property name as a string.

Returns

a boolean.

SSGetShifts

function SSGetShifts(shiftIds,
callBack,
errorHandler)

Similar to SSLoadShifts, probably should be merged.  Only used by plugins.

Parameters

shiftIdsan array of shift ids.
callBacka callback function.
errorHandlera error handling function.

SSGetPageShiftIdsForUser

function SSGetPageShiftIdsForUser()

Gets all the shifts ids on the current page for the logged in user.

Returns

An array of shift ids.

function SSAttachPinEvents()

Attaches the mouse events to the window to handle Pin selection.

function SSRemovePinEvents()

Remove all pin selection listening events from the window.

function SSStartPinSelection(widget)

Start pin selection mode.

Parameters

widgetthe PinWidget object that started the pin selection operation.

SSStopPinSelection

function SSStopPinSelection()

Stop handling pin selection.

loadFile (private)

function loadFile(url,
callback)

Loads a URL and executes a callback with the response

Parameters

urlThe URL of the target file
callbackA function to process the file once it’s loaded

loadSpace (private)

function loadSpace(space,
pendingShift,
callback)

Loads the space’s source code, executes it and stores an instance of the space class in the ‘spaces’ object

Parameters

spacethe Space name to load
pendingShifta pending shift id, will probably become deprecaed.
callbacka callback function to run when the space is loaded.

SSRegisterSpace (private)

function SSRegisterSpace(instance)

Called by the Space class to register with ShiftSpace.

Parameters

instanceA space object.

SSRemoveShift

function SSRemoveShift(shiftId)

Remove a shift from the internal array.

Parameters

shiftIda shift id.

SSLoadPlugin (private)

function SSLoadPlugin(plugin,
callback)

Loads a plugin

Parameters

plugina plugin name as a string.
callbacka callback function.

SSRegisterPlugin (private)

function SSRegisterPlugin(plugin)

Register a plugin.

Parameters

plugina plugin object.

serverCall (private)

function serverCall(method,
parameters,
_callback)

Sends a request to the server.

Parameters

methodWhich method to call on the server (string)
parametersValues passed with the call (object)
callback(optional) A function to execute upon completion

setValue (private)

function setValue(key,
value,
rawValue)

A wrapper function for GM_setValue that handles non-string data better.

Parameters

keyA unique string identifier
valueThe value to store.  This will be serialized by uneval() before it gets passed to GM_setValue.

Returns

The value passed in.

getValue (private, except in debug mode)

function getValue(key,
defaultValue,
rawValue)

A wrapper function for GM_getValue that handles non-string data better.

Parameters

keyA unique string identifier
defaultValueThis value will be returned if nothing is found.
rawValueDoesn’t use Json encoding on stored values

Returns

Either the stored value, or defaultValue if none is found.

loadStyle (private)

function loadStyle(url,
callback,
frame)

Loads a CSS file, processes it to make URLs absolute, then appends it as a STYLE element in the page HEAD.

Parameters

urlThe URL of the CSS file to load
callbackA custom function to handle css text if you don’t want to use GM_addStyle
spaceCallbackA callback function for spaces that want to use GM_addStyle but need to be notified of CSS load.

log (private)

function log(msg,
verbose)

Logs a message to the console, but only in debug mode or when reporting errors.

Parameters

msgThe message to be logged in the JavaScript console.
verboseForce the message to be logged when not in debug mode.

SSCanGoFullScreen

function SSCanGoFullScreen()

Returns wether ShiftSpace can lose the fullscreen mode.

Parameters

Returns a boolean.

SSCanExitFullScreen

function SSCanExitFullScreen()

Return whther ShiftSpace is ready to return to full screen mode.

Returns

A boolean.

shiftIda shift id.

function SSHideErrorWindow()

Hide the error window.

Parameters

function loadFile(url,
callback)
Loads a URL and executes a callback with the response
function loadSpace(space,
pendingShift,
callback)
Loads the space’s source code, executes it and stores an instance of the space class in the ‘spaces’ object
function SSRegisterSpace(instance)
Called by the Space class to register with ShiftSpace.
function SSRemoveShift(shiftId)
Remove a shift from the internal array.
function SSLoadPlugin(plugin,
callback)
Loads a plugin
function SSRegisterPlugin(plugin)
Register a plugin.
function serverCall(method,
parameters,
_callback)
Sends a request to the server.
function setValue(key,
value,
rawValue)
A wrapper function for GM_setValue that handles non-string data better.
function getValue(key,
defaultValue,
rawValue)
A wrapper function for GM_getValue that handles non-string data better.
function loadStyle(url,
callback,
frame)
Loads a CSS file, processes it to make URLs absolute, then appends it as a STYLE element in the page HEAD.
function log(msg,
verbose)
Logs a message to the console, but only in debug mode or when reporting errors.
function SSCanGoFullScreen()
Returns wether ShiftSpace can lose the fullscreen mode.
function SSCanExitFullScreen()
Return whther ShiftSpace is ready to return to full screen mode.
function SSCreateErrorWindow()
Create the error window.
function SSShowErrorWindow(shiftId)
Show the error window.
function SSHideErrorWindow()
Hide the error window.

Update object description table for a shift.
